<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator"></a>

# EditorResourcePreviewGenerator

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Custom generator of previews.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Custom code to generate previews. Check [EditorSettings.filesystem/file_dialog/thumbnail_size](EditorSettings.md#EditorSettings_property_filesystem/file_dialog/thumbnail_size) to find a proper size to generate previews at.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__can_generate_small_preview"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_can_generate_small_preview**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__can_generate_small_preview)

If this function returns ``true``, the generator will call [_generate()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate) or [_generate_from_path()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_from_path) for small previews as well.

By default, it returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **_generate**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md), size\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md), metadata\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate)

Generate a preview from a given resource with the specified size. This must always be implemented.

Returning ``null`` is an OK way to fail and let another generator take care.

Care must be taken because this function is always called from a thread (not the main thread).

\ `metadata` dictionary can be modified to store file-specific metadata that can be used in [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin._make_tooltip_for_path()](EditorResourceTooltipPlugin.md#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__make_tooltip_for_path) (like image size, sample length etc.).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_from_path"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **_generate_from_path**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md), size\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md), metadata\: [Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_from_path)

Generate a preview directly from a path with the specified size. Implementing this is optional, as default code will load and call [_generate()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate).

Returning ``null`` is an OK way to fail and let another generator take care.

Care must be taken because this function is always called from a thread (not the main thread).

\ `metadata` dictionary can be modified to store file-specific metadata that can be used in [EditorResourceTooltipPlugin._make_tooltip_for_path()](EditorResourceTooltipPlugin.md#EditorResourceTooltipPlugin_private_method__make_tooltip_for_path) (like image size, sample length etc.).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_small_preview_automatically"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_generate_small_preview_automatically**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_small_preview_automatically)

If this function returns ``true``, the generator will automatically generate the small previews from the normal preview texture generated by the methods [_generate()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate) or [_generate_from_path()](EditorResourcePreviewGenerator.md#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__generate_from_path).

By default, it returns ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__handles"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_handles**\ (\ type\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePreviewGenerator_private_method__handles)

Returns ``true`` if your generator supports the resource of type `type`.
